API_Description: Sets a custom email message for a specific distribution method and review type.
API_Description_Reason: The method name 'setCustomEmailMessage' suggests that it is used to define or modify the content of an email message. The parameters indicate that this customization is specific to a distribution method and review type.
Returns_Reason: The method is likely used for setting a property or configuration, which typically does not return a value.

cMessage.description: The custom message to be used in the email.
cMessage.description_reason: The parameter name 'cMessage' implies it is the content of the email message.
cMessage.type_reason: Email messages are typically represented as strings.

cDistMethod.description: The distribution method for which the custom email message is set.
cDistMethod.description_reason: The parameter name 'cDistMethod' suggests it specifies the method of distribution, such as email or server-based.
cDistMethod.type_reason: Distribution methods are usually identified by string identifiers.

cReviewType.description: The type of review for which the custom email message is set.
cReviewType.description_reason: The parameter name 'cReviewType' indicates it specifies the category or type of review, such as peer review or approval.
cReviewType.type_reason: Review types are typically represented as strings to denote different categories.

bAcrobatCom.description: A boolean indicating whether the message is for Acrobat.com distribution.
bAcrobatCom.description_reason: The parameter name 'bAcrobatCom' suggests it is a flag to specify if the distribution involves Acrobat.com.
bAcrobatCom.type_reason: Boolean values are used for flags that indicate a true or false condition.
